title: Moonstar: Love Letter
description: The Moonstar visits children who are sad for various reasons. The Moonstar helps them to open their hearts. He helps them to let go of their sadness and feel the love and joy they have inside. He reminds them of what they really shining stars and pure love and joy.This time he visits Kamil, an 8-year-old boy who is in love with a girl and he is being punished for writing her a love letter. The Moonstar shows him that he has done everything right and that there is nothing braver than showing his love.
author: Amet Xhelili
